Load libraries
```{r}
library(testthat)
```

Test that the function returns an error with 0 length list
```{r}
test_that("list of length 0 returns an error", {
  test_list <- c()
  expect_error(response_unpacker(test_list))
})
```

Test that the resturned class is a vector
```{r}
test_that("function returns vector", {
  test_list <- list("anger" = 0.308, 
                    "fear" = 0.187, 
                    "joy" = 0.0955, 
                    "sadness" = 0.359, 
                    "surprise" = 0.0508)
  output <- response_unpacker(test_list)
  expected_output <- c(0.308, 0.187, 0.0955, 0.0359, 0.0508)
  expect_is(output, class = "vector")
  expect_equal(output, expected_output)
})
```
